description: This blueprint represents a cloud resource
title: Cluster Resource

type.description: Type of the cloud resource (e.g., virtual machine, database, storage, etc.)
type.title: Type

provider.description: Cloud service provider (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
provider.title: Provider

region.description: Region where the resource is deployed
region.title: Region

tags.description: Custom tags associated with the resource
tags.title: Tags

status.description: Current status of the resource (e.g., running, stopped, provisioning, etc.)
status.title: Status

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the resource was created
created_at.title: Created At

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the resource was last updated
updated_at.title: Updated At
